name: Airstralian: The Down Under Demo
description:
If you have the time, we'd like you to fill this survey after playing the game!
https://forms.gle/A7UHE9dkFBxY6UAh6

Step into the shoes of the Airstralian; a descendant from his homeland up above, to the land down under, in search for treasure and knowledge (mostly treasure), and use the power of the wind to safely traverse the Kangaruins!

This demo showcases a good part of the first world and a bit of the second; you can look forward to the full game releasing soon!

You can follow us on Twitter to interact with us and keep up to date with updates:
@LuckBuildGames

How to play
Guide the boomerang to the end of each level without hitting walls and other obstacles.
Each level includes additional challenges such as getting all gems in a single go, completing the level under par time, or getting all gems under a par time (without hitting anything) to earn the level's treasure! Completing the gem and par time challenges will grant you an extra star each, which are used to unlock the other worlds in the game.

Controls
- Drag and release Left Mouse Button to aim and throw the boomerang. This can be done from any point in the screen.
- Hold Right Mouse Button or Space Bar to slow down the boomerang.
- Press R to return the boomerang to the Airstralian.

Settings
Access the settings menu ingame to configure some accessibility features such as:
- Path projection: A couple of guidelines to visualize the trajectory of the boomerang.
- Mouse drag style: Choose between two styles of indicator; a full length arrow, and a more minimalist one.
- Camera zoom: A slider to adjust your ideal camera zoom, either to see more of the surroundings, or to see the boomerang from closer up.
- Lives: Whether you want the three extra hits to be enabled or not at all.
- Audio and resolution options.
